Name: Glacial
About the game: 1988, a venture into the snow to find your missing brother brings more terror than anticipated. Gameplay Glacial is a single player first person horror set in the 80's, you are brought into Glacial valley resort where you will explore the immersive interior and exterior locations to be faced with your fears and uncover the story behind the disappearances at the resort...or, is everything what it seems? Use your environment to find medical, light and weapon supplies to help you on your venture through the resort and down into the unknown, although, using weapons is not essential, play to your own style. Audio and visual scares aim to turn the chill in the cold, into a chill down your spine.
